attributes.action: The UK should hold an in/out referendum on the UKs membership of The European Union.
attributes.additional_details:
The EU is an undemocratic, authoritarian and corrupt organisation whose intention is to grab power as the government of a superstate.
The people have the unalienable right to remove or reject any government of which they disapprove; in the case of the EU this is not possible through the ballot box.
